title: Trimming, 18th century
medium: Colored silks on white in uncut voided velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Design of shields with coats of arms under a crown, alternately placed and separated by rosettes of flowers and leaves.  Colors: brown, yellow, and green on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, 18th century.
18th century. Colored silks on white in uncut voided velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-30.
